description:
Bashar Al-Abdulhadi

Sharing ideas why should developers work on translation/internationalization of their packages, why it's important for Django to spread when there are more languages for it and sharing some real world experience in this field. The talk speaks about multiple languages such as Arabic and how Arabish (Arabic+English) was used in the Transliteration methodology on the internet.
title: An Arabish lesson: Introducing Django to the foreign world
